1678970.name: Coloring Pixels - 1-Bit Pack
1678970.description:
1-Bit Book

This 1-Bit Book brings 20 new images to Coloring Pixels! Each image is a unique picture created in the retro 1-bit art style! That means each image has only 2 colors!
All images are kindly created by an external artist who wanted to contribute to Coloring Pixels!

Contents

The 1-Bit book unlocks the following images:

  • Hester Cigar - 50x80
  • Monk - 51x106
  • Dino - 52x70
  • Mummy - 75x64
  • My Curly - 79x116
  • Angler - 80x90
  • Knight - 80x187
  • Toad - 90x55
  • Snek - 95x72
  • Thief - 100x80
  • Night Creatures - 110x60
  • Alien Rush - 115x95
  • Mellow Stream - 140x170
  • Roadside - 150x70
  • Stand Off - 150x120
  • Nature Road - 150x250
  • Open Door - 175x125
  • Tavern Sitting - 200x50
  • ToastieLabs Window - 230x110
  • Over the Wall - 400x200
